The Winter Olympics don’t officially start until Friday (Aug. 6), but a few events have already started with preliminary, qualifying and group play rounds. One of the sports that starts ahead of the Games is ice hockey. Ice Hockey takes place at the Milano Santagiulia Ice Hockey Arena in PalaItalia and Milano Rho Ice Hockey Arena in Milan, Italy.
